title: “I didn’t expect it” – Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola on woeful Premier League champions form (Video)
description: Manchester City have now lost nine of their last 12 matches across all competitions, and though he expected the season to be a difficult one, manager Pep Guardiola didn’t think it would ever be this bad. Pep Guardiola: I knew this season would be tough… I didn’t expect this 😬 🔗 https://t.co/j5zRdHGahi pic.twitter.com/dlmH98qVHi — Hayters […] The post “I didn’t expect it” – Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola on woeful Premier League champions form (Video) appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Veselin Trajkovic

text: Manchester City have now lost nine of their last 12 matches across all competitions, and though he expected the season to be a difficult one, manager Pep Guardiola didn’t think it would ever be this bad. Pep Guardiola: I knew this season would be tough… I didn’t expect this 😬 🔗 https://t.co/j5zRdHGahi pic.twitter.com/dlmH98qVHi — Hayters TV (@HaytersTV) December 22, 2024
html:
Manchester City have now lost nine of their last 12 matches across all competitions, and though he expected the season to be a difficult one, manager Pep Guardiola didn’t think it would ever be this bad.

Pep Guardiola: I knew this season would be tough… I didn’t expect this 😬

🔗 https://t.co/j5zRdHGahi pic.twitter.com/dlmH98qVHi

— Hayters TV (@HaytersTV) December 22, 2024
